data.name: DynamicsCRM_Content
data.value:
The Dynamics 365 solution template contains everything needed for a secure, scalable and extensible Sales Management dashboard analytics. In just a few hours stand up an end-to-end solution including Scribe’s cloud-based ETL platform, a cloud or on-premise database, and polished Power BI reports (including a security model derived from your own Dynamics 365 instance).

Sales management for Dynamics 365:

  • Get started quickly with pre-built data models for Sales Management analytic dashboards
  • Use an intuitive wizard based UI to setup and customize data integration
  • Gain enterprise grade performance by processing large data volumes from Dynamics 365
  • Optimize data integration with incremental data extraction capability

Everything is freely available on GitHub and completely documented so you can spend your time customizing the end results instead of designing and coding from scratch.

data.name: DynamicsCRM_DetailTagline
data.value: Stand up a scalable, secure and extensible Power BI dashboard on your cloud or on-premise Dynamics 365 instance in a few hours. Spend your time customizing the solution for your business needs instead of starting from scratch.

data.name: DynamicsCRM_DetailTitle
data.value: Enterprise ready sales management analytics

data.name: DynamicsCRM_IndexTagline
data.value: Get powerful insights from your Dynamics 365 customers in Power BI with a scalable, extensible and secure solution. Accommodate your own CRM customizations, add data from other applications, such as actual revenue from your ERP system, and reuse features of the existing security model.

data.name: DynamicsCRM_Partner
data.value: Scribe

data.name: DynamicsCRM_Title
data.value: Sales Management for Dynamics 365

data.name: Salesforce_Content
data.value:
The Salesforce solution template contains everything needed for a secure, scalable and extensible Sales Management dashboard with actionable analytics. In just a few hours stand up an end-to-end solution including your choice of the Informatica Cloud Integration Platform or Scribe’s cloud-based platform, cloud or on-premise database, and polished Power BI reports (including a security model derived from your own Salesforce instance).

Sales management for Salesforce, simplified:

  • Get started quickly with pre-built data models for analytic dashboards.
  • Use an intuitive wizard based UI to setup and customize data integration
  • Gain enterprise grade performance by processing large data volumes from Salesforce
  • Optimize data integration with incremental data extraction capability

data.name: Salesforce_DetailTagline
data.value: Stand up a scalable, secure and extensible Salesforce Power BI dashboard in a few hours. Spend your time customizing the solution for your business needs instead of starting from scratch.

data.name: Salesforce_DetailTitle
data.value: Enterprise ready sales management analytics

data.name: Salesforce_IndexTagline
data.value: Get powerful insights from your Salesforce customer pipeline in Power BI with a scalable, extensible and secure solution. Accommodate your Salesforce customizations, create enterprise data mashups with data from other applications, such as actual revenue from your ERP system, and reuse features of the existing security model.

data.name: Salesforce_Partner
data.value: Informatica

data.name: Salesforce_Title
data.value: Sales Management for Salesforce

data.name: SCCM_Content
data.value: The System Center Power BI solution template contains everything needed for a SCCM dashboard with actionable analytics. Data from your SCCM installation is collected and stored in a database that you can extend and customize as you see fit. You will see your data rendered in powerful and compelling Power BI reports. You can also add information about your users and computers or create data mashups with data already collected.

data.name: SCCM_DetailTagline
data.value: Stand up a scalable and extensible System Center Configuration Manager dashboard in a few hours. Information is collected daily so you can see not only how your organization’s computer health looks like today, you can also see how those key metrics change over time. Quickly identify machines not up-to-date with software updates, successful and failed mitigations to malware infections to be able to act quickly.

data.name: SCCM_DetailTitle
data.value: Power BI Dashboard for System Center Configuration Manager

data.name: SCCM_IndexTagline
data.value: Increase IT productivity and efficiency by monitoring computer health, malware protection, software updates, and software inventory across your organization with compelling analytics and visualizations in Power BI. Compare your key System Center Configuration Manager metrics against your own customizable targets and see trends over time. Identify trouble spots and get the information you need to understand what needs to be done.

data.name: SCCM_Title
data.value: System Center Configuration Manager

data.name: Twitter_Content
data.value:
The Twitter template provides you with a complete brand/campaign solution. In just a few minutes, you will be able to stand up an end-to-end solution that pulls data from Twitter, enriches the data using machine learning and stores it in Azure SQL. You can then leverage our pre-built reports that leverage Microsoft research technology to start analyzing your Twitter data and augmenting it additional data sources.

Campaign/Brand Management for Twitter:

  • Get started quickly with pre-built data models for social analytics reporting
  • Use an intuitive wizard based UI to define your Twitter search queries and spin up the workflow
  • Leverage sophisticated visualizations such as the network graph created by Microsoft Research
  • Gain near real time analytics with the process kicked off on the appearance of a new Tweet

data.name: Twitter_DetailTagline
data.value: Analyze all your unstructured Twitter data with our scalable and extensible solution template. Track sentiment, topic trends and outreach for crucial occasions like events and campaigns, or continuously monitor user reactions to your products and services. Compare current sentiment and volume to historical data to see how trends change over time.

data.name: Twitter_DetailTitle
data.value: Social Analytics for your Twitter data

data.name: Twitter_IndexTagline
data.value: Analyze all your unstructured Twitter data with our scalable and extensible solution template. Track sentiment, topic trends and outreach for crucial occasions like events and campaigns, or continuously monitor user reactions to your products and services. Compare current sentiment and volume to historical data to see how trends change over time.

data.name: Twitter_Title
data.value: Campaign/Brand Management for Twitter

data.name: SAP_Content
data.value:
With the Simplement powered SAP Accounts Receivable template you can quickly and easily analyze information for several critical AR reporting areas. Out of the box you can begin to analyze your entire SAP AR information.

Start immediately with pre-built reports that highlight common AR reporting needs:

  • An up-to-date summary view of your current total AR balance allowing you to immediately focus on problematic companies, customers and more.
  • Travel through time to analyze historic AR trends and point in time balances of problem areas found at the summary level.
  • Identify your top worst receivables where over 90 balances exceed certain thresholds.
  • Receivable aging buckets as a % of total to identify which customers or companies are overrepresented in certain areas like over 90, 1-30 etc.

data.name: SAP_DetailTagline
data.value: Get started with your SAP Accounts Receivable reporting with these simple and intuitive Power BI dashboards designed by Simplement. Quickly and efficiently analyze your organization’s entire SAP AR environment at a glance and find the information you need to identify key problem areas.

data.name: SAP_DetailTitle
data.value: Accounts Receivable Reporting for SAP

data.name: SAP_IndexTagline
data.value: Quickly and efficiently analyze your organization’s entire SAP Accounts Receivables in Power BI. Visualize your accounts receivable by customer, company, document number and age for better data visibility, analysis and faster decision making. Travel back in time and see how accounts receivable compare now to then. This is a public preview so we’re actively soliciting feedback. Take it for a test drive and tell us what you think – what works, what doesn’t and how can it be improved.

data.name: SAP_Title
data.value: Accounts Receivable for SAP

data.name: Dynamics365_PSA_Content
data.value:
The Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation solution template contains everything needed for secure, scalable and extensible dashboards for Practice Management, Resource Management and Account Management. In just a few hours, you can stand up an end-to-end solution using the Dynamics 365 Data Export Service, a SQL Azure data store, and polished Power BI reports (including a security model derived from your own Dynamics 365 instance).

Practice Management for Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation solution template

  • Get started quickly with a pre-built data model for Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation.
  • Build dashboards from pre-built reports for Practice Managers, Resource Managers and Account Managers.
  • Practice Management reports cover Gross Margin, Sales, Revenue, Cost, Hours and Utilization and Practice Performance.
  • Resource Management reports cover resource and role utilization, forecasts and resource demand.
  • Account Management reports cover sales, sales pipeline, billings, contract performance and customer performance.
  • Extend the data model and modify the reports to meet your organizations specific needs.
  • Use an intuitive wizard based UI to setup and customize data integration.
  • Gain enterprise grade performance by processing large data volumes from Dynamics 365 using the Data Export Service.
  • Optimize data integration with incremental data extraction capability of the using the Dynamics 365 Data Export Service.

Everything is freely available on GitHub and completely documented so you can spend your time customizing the end results instead of designing and coding from scratch.

data.name: Dynamics365_PSA_DetailTagline
data.value: Set up an enterprise ready power BI solution for practice, resource and account management against your Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation instance in a few hours. Start with the pre-built content and model and extend it to fit your organization’s needs.

data.name: Dynamics365_PSA_DetailTitle
data.value: Enterprise-ready professional service management analytics

data.name: Dynamics365_PSA_IndexTagline
data.value: The Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation solution template focuses on information critical to the Professional Service Organization’s Practice Manager, Resource Manager and Account Manager. It includes analytical content for financial KPI’s such as revenue, cost and margin. It also includes other relevant KPI’s such as utilization, sales metrics, billings and resource demand.

data.name: Dynamics365_PSA_Title
data.value: Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Project Service Automation

data.name: Bing_News_Content
data.value:
Advanced Search for Bing News:

  • Get started quickly with pre-built data models for an advanced search experience
  • Use an intuitive wizard based UI to define your search queries and spin up the workflow
  • Leverage sophisticated machine learning algorithms including unsupervised and supervised models
  • Navigate seamlessly from the Power BI report to your chosen article in the browser

data.name: Bing_News_DetailTagline
data.value: The Bing News template provides you with the unique capability of matching your interests with relevant articles from hundreds of different news providers using sophisticated machine learning techniques. In just a few minutes you will be able to stand up an end-to-end pipeline that stiches together a whole range of Azure services including Azure SQL, Azure ML, Cognitive Services, Logic Apps, Azure Functions and more! You can then explore our pre-built reports that help you complete your analysis and find the right articles for you!

data.name: Bing_News_DetailTitle
data.value: Find articles relevant to you in an instant

data.name: Bing_News_IndexTagline
data.value: Filter and sort your news articles by key criteria like sentiment, topics or entities to find the news articles most important and relevant to your query. Scroll through snippets and seamlessly navigate to your chosen articles to learn the full story of how your search term (such as brand name, product, etc.) is being perceived in the news.

data.name: Bing_News_Title
data.value: Advanced Search for Bing News
